messages.content:
now third step is build app use io8 mcp tool build app pick the project id from the create_project.out pick the projectResp id keep the major id as 1 and minor id as 0 ONLY
Write this command to `.sureai/io8_mcp/requests/build_app.txt` and execute it:
```
gemini yolo command passing this prompt "build_app(projectId='[PROJECT_ID_FROM_PROJECT_RESPONSE]', majorId='1', minorId='0')"
```

Save response to `.sureai/io8_mcp/responses/build_app.out`
The app has been built successfully, and the response has been saved to `.sureai/io8_mcp/responses/build_app.out`.

thoughts.subject: Constructing App Build Command
thoughts.description: Okay, I'm working on pulling the `projectId` from the `create_project.out` file. Once I have that ID, I'll build the command to use with the `build_app` tool. I'm double-checking the extraction logic to make sure I'm grabbing the right part of the response.

thoughts.subject: Initializing Build Process
thoughts.description: I've begun the process by reading the `create_project.out` file. My immediate goal is to extract the `projectResp.id`. After that, I'll assemble the `build_app` command using this ID, along with the `majorId` and `minorId`. Finally, I'll execute the command and store the response.

thoughts.subject: Processing Project Details
thoughts.description: I've just successfully read the `create_project.out` file and retrieved the `project Resp.id`, which is `47729`. My next step involves constructing the `build_app` command. I'm preparing to write it to the specified file and then execute the command.

thoughts.subject: Saving Build Results
thoughts.description: I've successfully written the necessary build command to `build_app.txt`. My next action is to execute that command, `build_app`, and archive the output generated from the command to the file `build_app.out`. I'm confident this will produce the desired executable.

thoughts.subject: Processing Build Results
thoughts.description: I've successfully executed the `build_app` command. My next step is to neatly store the generated output in the designated file, `.sureai/io8_mcp/responses/build_app.out`, as per the user's instructions. This will provide a readily accessible record of the build process.

thoughts.subject: Achieving Completion
thoughts.description: I've finalized the core functionality, successfully saving the generated response to the designated file. All prescribed steps in the process have been executed and the desired outcome achieved. The application is now fully operational and ready for use.
